Cloud based VPS hosting offers some great benefits to the businesses, right from performance to website page load speed. Some key features of cloud-based VPS hosting are as below –

  • Each VPS performs and executes like a stand-alone server for its users and applications.
  • Each VPS can be rebooted independently, has its own root access, users, IP addresses, memory, processes, applications, system libraries and configuration files.
  • A VPS offers the same level of root access as a dedicated server, so as a user you have the ability to install and run your own scripts or software in a virtual hosting environment.
  • If you need to host unlimited domains, have complete control of your environment and run your own applications at an affordable price, then VPS is the way to go for you.
